rows.label: qst202610_msg0001
rows.name:
I thought that as a weapon,
my existence would only
bring misery to people.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0002
rows.name:
But Rex's words have
made me reconsider.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0003
rows.name:
But Nia's words have
made me reconsider.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0004
rows.name:
But Zeke's words have
made me reconsider.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0005
rows.name:
But Meleph's words have
made me reconsider.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0006
rows.name:
Not to destroy something,
but to protect someone...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202610_msg0007
rows.name:
I want to use my power for
the happiness of people.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0008
rows.name: Is it strange to think this way?

rows.label: qst202610_msg0009
rows.name: Not at all!

rows.label: qst202610_msg0010
rows.name:
As your Driver, and as your
friend, I'll support you, Ten'i!

rows.label: qst202610_msg0011
rows.name: Not at all.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0012
rows.name:
As your Driver, and as your
friend, I'll support you, Ten'i!

rows.label: qst202610_msg0013
rows.name: Not at all.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0014
rows.name:
As your Driver, and as your friend,
I will support you, Ten'i.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0015
rows.name: Not at all.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0016
rows.name:
As your Driver, and as your
friend, I'll support you, Ten'i!

rows.label: qst202610_msg0017
rows.name: I am grateful.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0018
rows.name:
I will do my best to live
up to your feelings, Rex.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0019
rows.name:
I will do my best to live
up to your feelings, Nia.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0020
rows.name:
I will do my best to live
up to your feelings, Zeke.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0021
rows.name:
I will do my best to live up
to your feelings, Meleph.
